name: Japan
amazingFact: Japan is home to the world’s oldest company, Kongo Gumi, which operated for over 1,400 years.

name: Brazil
amazingFact: Brasília was designed in the shape of an airplane and built in just 41 months in the 1950s.

name: Egypt
amazingFact: Cairo is home to the Great Pyramid of Giza, the only surviving Wonder of the Ancient World.

name: Iceland
amazingFact: Iceland is one of the only countries in the world without mosquitoes.

name: Australia
amazingFact: Australia is the only country that is also a continent and has more kangaroos than people.
